content: To connect to the internet you must do it via the ucopia portal
You have to go to the website : ucopia.all-lacatho.fr
If this is your first time logging in, you need to do Forgotten password to receive your login details
You will then be asked to enter your email address. The email to enter is the one used when you registered in the residence
If you have received your login details, all you have to do is enter them to access the internet!
If the login page tells you that there are too many devices connected, you need to reset your router (press the reset button behind your router for 10 seconds)
Do not hesitate to send a message to Nicolas if you have any problems!
Here is the link to the site where you can find your housing account : https://logement.all-lacatho.fr/login
Your login details should have been sent to you by email, if not do 'Identifiants oubli√©s' or send an email to the housing department
Please respect the quiet in the hallways and rooms!
Alcohol and illegal substances are prohibited. Failure to do so may result in immediate expulsion
It is also forbidden to smoke in the corridors and in the rooms. You will find ashtrays at your disposal in each residence. If you do not have one, you can request one from your referrers
Please sort your trash and use the yellow garbage can for recyclables!
Other trash goes in the black garbage cans, not next to it or in the hallways!
When you are asked for the address where to send your packages, you should put 47 Boulevard Vauban and not the address of the residence
Once your package has been received, the ALL will send you an email within 24 hours telling you that your package has arrived
You can then go to the ALL offices on the 1st floor of 47 Boulevard Vauban to collect your package!
The ALL offers a variety of university restaurants (when restaurants are open, see after this section) :
- In the basement of 125 rue Meurein :
‚Ä¢ Le Globe-trotter : kitchen of the world
‚Ä¢ Le Tradi : to eat like at home
‚Ä¢ Le Green : to eat healthy or vegetarian
‚Ä¢ La Sandwicherie : sandwiches and salads on the spot and to take away
- On the first floor of 47 boulevard Vauban :
‚Ä¢ Le Food Corner : fast food
- At the academic hotel of 60 boulevard Vauban :
‚Ä¢ La Sandwicherie du 60 : sandwiches and salads on the spot and to take away
All university restaurants are ‚Ç¨1 for students with grants, and ‚Ç¨3.30 otherwise
All payments are made via the ALL card (the same card you use to enter the residence)
To check that your payment has gone to ‚Ç¨1, or to simply add money to your card, everything is done on this site : https://resto-aeu.moneweb.fr
The login is your card number, while the password was given to you when you were given your card
Don't hesitate to request a forgotten password or to send an email to the ALL if you lost it
During the Covid period, only the Globe-trotter and Tradi restaurants are open
At the Tradi you will find pasta, pizzas, sandwiches, ciabattas and wraps, which you can eat on site
At the Globe-trotter, you will find the same products but only to take away
You also have the possibility of click and collect, to be picked up at the Globe-trotter by ordering on this website

At the end, you can pay directly with your ALL card, and if you have filled in the form to have the meals at 1‚Ç¨, your meals will be at 1‚Ç¨ (even if it is marked 3‚Ç¨30 on the click and collect website, you can check that the meal is at 1‚Ç¨) ici)
Do not hesitate to send a message to Mathilde or to Nicolas for any further questions!
You can ask the All for a spare bed if you need to accommodate someone in your home
The bed is a spare folding bed provided with bed linen
The price is 5‚Ç¨ per night, but if you take for the evening(s) of Friday and/or Saturday and/or Sunday, the 'weekend price' will be applied at 15‚Ç¨
You can request it directly on your housing account or by sending an email to the housing department
Once the confirmation is received, the technical service will deliver it to your room for the requested day
!!! We remind you that the mask is compulsory in the residence at the risk of sanctions ! (from a warning to exclusion)
You have normally all received a brass key ring (if not you can ask for one at the housing department), feel free to use it as much as possible on lift buttons, handles and so on
Remember to wash your hands regularly! If you can't, use hydroalcoholic gel
If you have one or more symptoms, please inform the housing department as soon as possible by phone or by email !
For more information, you can refer to this document : Sanitary instructions FR, Sanitary instructions EN
